title: About Me
summary: Undergraduate student in Computer and Artificial Intelligence at Jeonbuk National University.
content: Hi! I'm Sangah Ahn, a third-year undergraduate student majoring in Computer and Artificial Intelligence at Jeonbuk National University. I am currently a research student at the 'Medical AI and Computational Science Laboratory,' studying the principles and applications of deep learning. I enjoy exploring how AI can solve practical problems in healthcare and data science.

title: Major Projects
summary: Portfolio of key academic and personal projects.
content: Developed and deployed a multilingual academic portfolio website using HugoBlox and GitHub Pages. Designed and implemented automatic CI/CD pipelines with GitHub Actions. Built a responsive UI with multilingual support (Korean and English), dark mode, and SEO optimization.

title: Contact

content: Phone: +82-10-3630-4640 / Email: dkstkddkdhkd@jbnu.ac.kr / GitHub: ansangah / Instagram: @ahnneu_. Feel free to reach out for collaborations or academic inquiries!

title: Location
summary: Campus and lab location at Jeonbuk National University.
content: College of Engineering, Building 7, Jeonbuk National University, 567 Baekje-daero, Deokjin-gu, Jeonju-si, Jeollabuk-do, Republic of Korea.
